name: Zip WebApp (Beta)
description: All client-side solution for Browser Chrome to create zip archive and extract zip and rar archive files with API HTML5 file system
content_security_policy: script-src 'self'; child-src 'self' data:; default-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' data:;
